data.text:
Please would you start with this task this week? The reason I put this on here early is so we don't have to rush this.

Please just get a clean copy of SearchWorks running. Clear all search history, users, companies, billing and create 1 company called Index360 in ClientCentral with a couple of our internal users.

Disable all the search types except for the Maintenance Order searches.

You can use the following URL's:

ui.index360.co.za
wcf.index360.co.za
billing.index360.co.za
clients.index360.co.za

Then, everywhere it states SearchWorks we have to replace with Index 360.

Just ask @johnfrier to setup those URL's on our UAT, or DEV, or any other server he feels would be fine for the first phase.

Thanks guys.

@willemhuman @yasserogier @lylenutt @cobuspienaar @stefanbar
